Articles.Content:
So, I got myself KBS two days ago and have to say I've been loving every minute of it (no clue why I waited this long to get it). On the other hand, I'm not really sure how good of an idea it was to get it, with two exams left to be done at Uni next week.. But, I'll manage!

Anyhow, so far, I've managed to launch my Kerbals into space, build something that very barely represents a space shuttle and actually flies and after a lot of trying and tinkering around, even construct a rocket and a lander that can take my Kerbals to the Mun / Minmus and back as well! But of course, before I managed to do so, there were "a few" mishaps bound to happen.. Jeb for example, was brave enough to land on the Mun, take off, come back into Kerbin's orbit, but ran out of fuel to actually re-enter... But, it's not like that was going to stop him...

Well, I'm sure you'll be seing more of me around the forums very soon, so, happy flying everyone!

Edited July 8, 2013 by Atraeh
